verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that came to <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H4183>Morashtite<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> you <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> all of <S%H7181>you.<s%> Listen, O <S%H776>earth,<s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein:<s%> and let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%> against <S%H136>you,<s%> the Lord from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H3068>For,<s%> behold, Yahweh comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and will come <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%> under <S%H6010>him,<s%> and the valleys <S%H1234>split<s%> <S%H1749>apart,<s%> like wax <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> like <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are <S%H5064>poured<s%> down a steep <S%H4174>place.<s%>

"All this is for the <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> What is the <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob?<s%> <S%H8111>Isn't<s%> it Samaria? And what are the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> <S%H3389>Aren't<s%> they Jerusalem?

Therefore I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> like a rubble <S%H5856>heap<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> like places for planting <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> and I will pour <S%H5064>down<s%> its <S%H68>stones<s%> into the <S%H1516>valley,<s%> and I will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> its <S%H3247>foundations.<s%>

All her <S%H6456>idols<s%> will be beaten to <S%H3807>pieces,<s%> and all her temple <S%H868>gifts<s%> will be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and all her <S%H6091>images<s%> I <S%H7760>will<s%> <S%H8077>destroy;<s%> for of the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> has she <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H868>them,<s%> and to the hire of a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> shall they <S%H7725>return.<s%>"

For this I will <S%H5594>lament<s%> and <S%H3213>wail;<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7758>stripped<s%> and <S%H6174>naked;<s%> I <S%H6213>will<s%> <S%H4553>howl<s%> like the <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> and <S%H60>moan<s%> like the daughters of <S%H1323>owls.<s%>

For her <S%H4347>wounds<s%> are <S%H605>incurable;<s%> for it has <S%H935>come<s%> even to <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> It <S%H5060>reaches<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> even to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H5046>Don't<s%> tell it in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> <S%H1058>Don't<s%> weep at <S%H1058>all.<s%> At Beth <S%H1036>Ophrah<s%> I have <S%H6428>rolled<s%> myself in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

Pass <S%H5674>on,<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8208>Shaphir,<s%> in <S%H6181>nakedness<s%> and <S%H1322>shame.<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6630>Zaanan<s%> <S%H3318>won't<s%> come out. The <S%H4553>wailing<s%> of Beth <S%H1018>Ezel<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> from you his <S%H5979>protection.<s%>

For the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4796>Maroth<s%> waits <S%H2342>anxiously<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> because <S%H7451>evil<s%> has come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H7573>Harness<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to the swift <S%H7409>steed,<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish.<s%> She was the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> For the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were found in <S%H4672>you.<s%>

Therefore you will <S%H5414>give<s%> a parting <S%H7964>gift<s%> to Moresheth <S%H4182>Gath.<s%> The <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%> will be a deceitful <S%H391>thing<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I will yet <S%H935>bring<s%> to <S%H3427>you,<s%> inhabitant of <S%H4762>Mareshah.<s%> <S%H3423>He<s%> who is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5725>Adullam.<s%>

<S%H7139>Shave<s%> your <S%H1494>heads,<s%> and cut off your hair for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H8588>delight.<s%> <S%H7337>Enlarge<s%> your <S%H7144>baldness<s%> like the <S%H5404>vulture;<s%> for they have gone into captivity from <S%H1540>you!<s%>
